title: Embraced by the Sun
description: In gorgeous St. Martin, Peter Fitzgerald and his friends are enjoying the best bachelor's party ever. Prepared to marry the women he loves and to begin as close to perfect of a life as he could hope to have, Peter thinks he has it all planned out. A chance encounter with a handsome sorcerer, not only destroys his plans, but also turns his life on end. Forced to confront an inner darkness that he has hid for so long, Peter has to learn not only to face his secret but to embrace it.
author: Mya Lairis
